title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 846.5 - Table I
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 846.5 - Table I
State Regulations
TABLE I
CLASSIFICATIONS AND STANDARDS OF QUALITY AND PURITY
WHICH ARE ASSIGNED TO ALL FRESH SURFACE WATERS WITHIN THE IRONDEQUOIT BAY
DRAINAGE BASIN, MONROE, ONTARIO AND WAYNE COUNTIES, NEW YORK
Item

No. Waters Index

Number

Name

Description

Map

Ref. No. Class

Standards
1

Ont. 108

Irondequoit Bay Outlet

Enters Lake Ontario from south along southerly
shore of lake 3.8 miles southeast of mouth of Genesee River and 0.9 mile east
of easterly boundary of Durand Eastman Park in City of Rochester. H-9ne
B
B
2

Ont. 108-P 113

Irondequoit Bay

Located on Irondequoit Bay outlet beginning
immediately upstream from Lake Ontario and extending approximately 4 miles in
southerly direction. H-9ne
B
B
3

Trib. of Irondequoit Bay

Enters northeasterly part of Irondequoit Bay from
southeast 0.9 mile east of Irondequoit Bay outlet and in Town of Webster. H-9ne
C
C

C

Ont. 108-P 113-3-12-3 and tribs., including P 127a

Road. P 127e is located immediately south of Macedon Center Road 0.1 mile east

127h are located within tracts of land bounded on north by Whitney Road, on
